scriptLines:
query: 'DECLARE @LINES VARCHAR(MAX)
SELECT
     @LINES = CONCAT(@LINES, CHAR(10), '') + [LINE]
FROM
     (
     SELECT
          CONCAT('02|', ACCNT_ID) AS LINE
     FROM
          CREDIT_UAT.CC_UPDATE_CA_INFO
     WHERE
          STATUS = 'P'
     ORDER BY
          CA_ID ASC OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH NEXT 50000 ROWS ONLY) T
SELECT
     CONCAT((SELECT CONCAT('01|', '20220720_163205') AS LINE),(SELECT @LINES), CHAR(10),(SELECT
     '09|' + CONVERT(varchar(255),
     COUNT(T2.LINE)) AS LINE
FROM
     (
     SELECT
          CONCAT('02|', ACCNT_ID) AS LINE
     FROM
          CREDIT_UAT.CC_UPDATE_CA_INFO
     WHERE
          STATUS = 'P'
     ORDER BY
          CA_ID ASC OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH NEXT 50000 ROWS ONLY) T2)) AS LINE;',
